snippet: Du Bin said he could still face trial for accusations he said stemmed from his recent film about a Chinese labor camp and a book about the crackdown on Tiananmen Square protesters.
abstract: Du Bin, Chinese journalist and documentary filmmaker whose work has been harshly critical of life in China, is released on bail after spending five weeks in a Beijing jail.
lead_paragraph: Du Bin said he could still face trial for accusations he said stemmed from his recent film about a Chinese labor camp and a book about the crackdown on Tiananmen Square protesters.

headline.main: Chinese Journalist Is Released on Bail
headline.print_headline: China: Journalist Is Out of Jail
